com.github.fge.jsonschema.core.report

Interface MessageProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValueHolder

    public interface MessageProvider
    Message providing interface

    This interface must be implemented by all inputs and outputs used by Processors. This allows a processor to grab a context-dependent message for more accurate reporting.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProcessingMessage newMessage()
      Provide a message template for this context

    • Method Detail

      • newMessage

        ProcessingMessage newMessage()
        Provide a message template for this context
        Returns:
        a new processing message
